ðŸ”§ How to Use TSRExporter:

1. Install the Extension: Add TSRExporter to your Chrome browser.
2. Perform a Search: Use TikTok's search page and apply any filters you need. Remember, what you see is what you get! 
3. Export Search Data: Click the "Export" button. The tool will automatically scroll through the search results and export the desired information, then download a CSV file.
4. Verify the CSV File: Open the CSV file to ensure the data meets your needs.
5. Subscribe for More: Subscribe to unlock the ability to download more entries per search.
